data.body: Hierarchical beads are rendered in non-deterministic order. Children should be sorted by natural ID order (1,2,3,4,5) not by priority/status. Affects beats, scenes, direct, final cut, and retakes views.
data.description: Hierarchical beads are rendered in non-deterministic order. Children should be sorted by natural ID order (1,2,3,4,5) not by priority/status. Affects beats, scenes, direct, final cut, and retakes views.
data.title: Fix hierarchical bead ordering in all views
